name: io.github.Berckan/bugherd-mcp
description: BugHerd integration. Full MCP server + restricted project-scoped server.

environmentVariables.description: BugHerd API key from Settings > General Settings
environmentVariables.name: BUGHERD_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: (Restricted server) Bot user id for comments
environmentVariables.name: BUGHERD_BOT_USER_ID

environmentVariables.description: (Restricted server) Max chars returned for task descriptions
environmentVariables.name: BUGHERD_DESCRIPTION_MAX_CHARS

environmentVariables.description: (Restricted server) Max chars returned for comment text
environmentVariables.name: BUGHERD_COMMENT_MAX_CHARS

environmentVariables.description: (Restricted server) Optional comma-separated active column ids
environmentVariables.name: BUGHERD_ACTIVE_COLUMN_IDS
